mapper.select: select from base_city where id = #{value} AND del_flag = '0'

SELECT p.id AS id, p.parent_city_id AS parentCityId , p.city_name AS cityName, p.city_type AS cityType , p.order_weight AS orderWeight , p.create_user AS createUser, p.create_time AS createTime, p.city_weight AS cityWeight, p.update_user AS updateUser , p.update_time AS updateTime, p.delete_user AS deleteUser, p.delete_time AS deleteTime, p.del_flag AS delFlag FROM base_city p,base_city s WHERE s.id = #{value} and p.id = s.parent_city_id AND p.del_flag = '0'
